amendment.description: Amendment makes technical and clarifying changes and directs various studies on energy conservation education, anticipated demand growth for natural gas consumption in the west, modification of the gasoline excise tax to promote cleaner burning fuel in the study on boutique fuels, and the feasibility of establishing a renewable fuel standard.
amendment.purpose: Part B amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 107-178 to make technical and clarifying changes in the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tauzin amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 281 - 148 (Roll no. 309).
